name: Knight Shift: Kings March
description:
Welcome to Knight Shift, you play as a noble knight who must PROTECT (*wink*) their royal King as you traverse through lands of exceedingly difficult waves of magic projectiles. As many try to prove their worth, will you be the strongest knight of the lands? See how you stack up with your fellow knights to see who is truly worth protecting the King.

Made in just three days for the ScoreSpace #17 Jam!
